<<<<<<< HEAD
Of fasting a sermon preached before the Queen at White-hall, on May 23, MDCXCIV, being a day of publick humiliation / by Richard, Lord Bishop of Bath and Wells ; published by Her Majesties special command. Kidder, Richard, 1633-1703.
[4], 28 p.
Printed by J.H. for Brabazon Aylmer ..., London : MDCXCIV [1694]
Half-title: The Bishop of Bath and Wells's fast-day sermon before the Queen at White-Hall on the 23d of May, 1694. Running title: A fast-sermon preached before the Queen at White-Hall. This item appears at reel 499:18 as Wing K408, and at reel 1741:39 as Wing (2nd ed.) K416A. Reproduction of originals in Bristol Public Library, Bristol (England), and in Huntington Library.
=======

[4], 28 p.
Printed by J.H. for Brabazon Aylmer ..., London : MDCXCIV [1694]
Half-title: The Bishop of Bath and Wells's fast-day sermon before the Queen at White-Hall on the 23d of May, 1694. Running title: A fast-sermon preached before the Queen at White-Hall. This item appears at reel 499:18 as Wing K408, and at reel 1741:39 as Wing (2nd ed.) K416A. Reproduction of originals in Bristol Public Library, Bristol (England), and in Huntington Library.
Brabazon Aylmer
